lyrics.lyric: It's So Easy
It's so easy to fall in love
It's so easy to fall in love
People tell me love's for fools
lyrics.tlyric: 人们常和我说，傻瓜才会恋爱

lyrics.lyric: So here I go breaking all the rules
lyrics.tlyric: 所以我要打破所有常规

lyrics.lyric: Seems so easy, so doggone easy
It seems so easy
Where you're concerned, my heart can learn
lyrics.tlyric: 你所担心的地方，我会用心感受

lyrics.lyric: It's so easy to fall in love
It's so easy to fall in love
It's so easy to fall in love
It's so easy to fall in love
Look into your heart and see
What your lovebook has set aside for me
lyrics.tlyric: 你已经为我留好了爱之书

lyrics.lyric: It seems so easy, so doggone easy
lyrics.tlyric: 坠入爱河看似很简单，如此简单

lyrics.lyric: It seems so easy
Where you're concerned, my heart can learn
lyrics.tlyric: 你所担心的地方，我会用心感受

lyrics.lyric: It's so easy to fall in love
It's so easy to fall in love
It seems so easy, so doggone easy
It seems so easy
Where you're concerned, my heart can learn
lyrics.tlyric: 你所担心的地方，我会用心感受

lyrics.lyric: It's so easy to fall in love
It's so easy to fall in love
